Articles.Content:
Barely.

The user below me likes the Serbian anthem

#BOZE SPASI BOZE HRANIIIIII#

Nope.

The user below me thinks that my little pony would be funnier if that dragon thought the yellow one looked like a baby.

(ninja'd, but I guess the answer is still the same since I've never heard it)

I'm indifferent to MLP...

The user below me has read A brave new world.

...I think?

the user below me is pony

I am not a pony!

The user below me knows a card-trick.

yes if blowing up the card counts

the person below cheacked for inviso text

why hello there

Well hello yourself

The user below me has played one of the old free versions of KSP.

True! Ah, the good ole days when I just watched stuff explode.

The user below me isn't afraid of the internet. Don't worry if you aren't, I'll help with that (jk mods, jk).

True

The user below me has a gf

False, don't plan a pity party for me. I've seen the statistics and i"m happy that I don't have one.

User below me is amazed by space.

yep

user below is brony,

NOPE

The user below me has a fish named Bob that has no relation to KSP Bob.

False, I don't even have a fish.

The user below me is one of the 3 major bronies on the forum games.

...I think?...maybe....

the user below me thinks there's a giant conspiracy to cover up anything pony related on this forum...

There is.

(not really)

The user below me can back me up.

Roger that.

The person below me is also staff.

Correct!!

The person below is also staff.

Dang straight! (EDIT: Oh dear, what did I just agree to?)

The user below me has their hair done up in an afro.

I'm not from the disco era, so nope.

The user below me is Thor's daddy.

Sorry to disappoint.

Get back here Odin, thou art the next user to post, no?

Pfft nope!

The user below me like to fly like an eagle.

Yeah, I guess so.

The user below me has studied spontaneous human combustion.

Of course, I've also studied not so spontaneous human combustion, and the art of setting oneself on fire.

The person below me has seen Planet of the Apes.

Only the rise of the planet of the apes

The next user will confuse us all.

Hamburgers are the best mustard swimmers and will be the platinum medal winners in the 2017 Las Vegas olympics!

The next user will be mildly freaked out by my crazy outburst.
